languages.text: "Верность моя Домин проистекает из воли Неумирающего. Такова нить сего клинка, пока шепот Его не укажет плести иную". {n}Девушка отвечает спокойно и уверенно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Верность моя Домин проистекает из воли Неумирающего. Такова нить сего клинка, пока шепот Его не укажет плести иную". {n}Девушка отвечает спокойно и уверенно.{/n}

languages.text: "My loyalty to the Domin stems from the Undying One's will. Such is the thread of this blade, until His whisper bids it to spin a different one," {n}Kibellah responds with calm assurance.{/n}

languages.text: «Mi lealtad a{mf| la} Domin proviene de la voluntad del Inmortal. Tal es el hilo de esta hoja, hasta que Sus susurros le ordenen tejer uno diferente», {n}responde Kibellah con una calma absoluta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My loyalty to the Domin stems from the Undying One's will. Such is the thread of this blade, until His whisper bids it to spin a different one," {n}Kibellah responds with calm assurance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi lealtad a{mf| la} Domin proviene de la voluntad del Inmortal. Tal es el hilo de esta hoja, hasta que Sus susurros le ordenen tejer uno diferente», {n}responde Kibellah con una calma absoluta.{/n}

languages.text: 「ドミンへの我が忠誠は不死の者の意志に由来します。主の囁きが別の者を織るように命じるまで、この刃の糸はそうするためのものです」{n}キベラは冷静に答えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My loyalty to the Domin stems from the Undying One's will. Such is the thread of this blade, until His whisper bids it to spin a different one," {n}Kibellah responds with calm assurance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ドミンへの我が忠誠は不死の者の意志に由来します。主の囁きが別の者を織るように命じるまで、この刃の糸はそうするためのものです」{n}キベラは冷静に答えた。{/n}

languages.text: “我对秘者的忠诚源于不死之神的意志，这便是这把利刃的命中注定的丝线，除非不死之神的低语要求它纺织新的丝线。”{n}绮贝菈平静而自信地回答道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My loyalty to the Domin stems from the Undying One's will. Such is the thread of this blade, until His whisper bids it to spin a different one," {n}Kibellah responds with calm assurance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我对秘者的忠诚源于不死之神的意志，这便是这把利刃的命中注定的丝线，除非不死之神的低语要求它纺织新的丝线。”{n}绮贝菈平静而自信地回答道。{/n}

languages.text: "Meine Loyalität gegenüber {mf|dem|der} Domin entspringt dem Willen des Todlosen. Das gilt auch für den Faden dieser Klinge, bis mir Sein Flüstern gebietet, einen anderen Faden zu spinnen", {n}erwidert Kibellah mit ruhiger Gewissheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My loyalty to the Domin stems from the Undying One's will. Such is the thread of this blade, until His whisper bids it to spin a different one," {n}Kibellah responds with calm assurance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Meine Loyalität gegenüber {mf|dem|der} Domin entspringt dem Willen des Todlosen. Das gilt auch für den Faden dieser Klinge, bis mir Sein Flüstern gebietet, einen anderen Faden zu spinnen", {n}erwidert Kibellah mit ruhiger Gewissheit.{/n}

languages.text: « Ma loyauté {mf|au Domin|à la Domin} est le fruit de la volonté de l'Immortel. À l'image du fil que trace cette lame et jusqu'à ce que Ses murmures m'ordonnent d'en tisser un autre, » {n}répond Kibellah avec une confiance sereine.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My loyalty to the Domin stems from the Undying One's will. Such is the thread of this blade, until His whisper bids it to spin a different one," {n}Kibellah responds with calm assurance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ma loyauté {mf|au Domin|à la Domin} est le fruit de la volonté de l'Immortel. À l'image du fil que trace cette lame et jusqu'à ce que Ses murmures m'ordonnent d'en tisser un autre, » {n}répond Kibellah avec une confiance sereine.{/n}

languages.text: "Domin'e sadakatim, Ölmeyen'in arzusundan doğar. Fısıltılarında yeni bir iplik dokunmasını emredene dek onun kılıcının izleyeceği iplik budur." {n}Kibellah, sakin ve öz güvenli bir yanıt veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My loyalty to the Domin stems from the Undying One's will. Such is the thread of this blade, until His whisper bids it to spin a different one," {n}Kibellah responds with calm assurance.{/n}
